SELECT hash_no, hash_name, hash_count, total_hash_count FROM ( SELECT h.hash_no, h.hash_name, COUNT(r.hash_no) AS hash_count FROM hashtag h LEFT OUTER JOIN review r ON r.hash_no = h.hash_no WHERE cafe_no = #{cafe_no} GROUP BY h.hash_no, h.hash_name ORDER BY COUNT(r.hash_no) DESC ) subquery JOIN ( SELECT SUM(hash_count) AS total_hash_count FROM( SELECT h.hash_no, h.hash_name, COUNT(r.hash_no) AS hash_count FROM hashtag h LEFT OUTER JOIN review r ON r.hash_no = h.hash_no WHERE cafe_no = #{cafe_no} GROUP BY h.hash_no, h.hash_name ORDER BY COUNT(r.hash_no) DESC ) where rownum <=4 ) ON 1=1 WHERE ROWNUM <= 4
select nvl(trunc(avg(cafe_star),1),0) as staravg from review where cafe_no = #{cafe_no}
